name: Go, Martin, Go!
description:
In the town of Puddleport, USA, there lies a middle school and the middle schoolers who attend it. Out of sheer boredom, the kids have devised a little game: get from one side of the town's bridge to the other in as little time as possible. You are Martin McFlannigan, the only kid to not yet win a round of this competition. After taking cues from a certain 80s Time-Traveling Sci-Fi movie, however, you decide to make your next attempt a little more daring...

NOTE: DO NOT ATTEMPT ANY ACTIONS DEPICTED IN-GAME AT HOME (i.e. SKATEBOARDING IN AND AROUND TRAFFIC). Schpass Games is NOT liable for anything you choose to do beyond playing this video game. Thank you :)

CONTROLS:

-W (or Up Arrow) to speed up

-A and D (or Left and Right Arrows) to go left or right, respectively

-M to mute and unmute background music

-L repeatedly to lower background music volume

-U repeatedly to raise background music volume

-R to reset Best Time

---------------------------------------------------

Developed by Schpass Games, 2020
